mainText:
Sudden tragedies remind of the fragility of life,

Steve Jobs was not just important to his friends, family and co-workers but to the world, we have all lost a visionary and a man who sought the good in all things, but we must honour the legacy he has left behind, one that will prosper for many years to come and through this Steve remains with us all.

Thank you Steve for changing the lives of so many, and may you Rest in Peace.
author: Shaun
